problems.description: Test file contained markdown code fences and an incorrect assertion for multiply (expected 5 instead of 6), causing pytest failures.
Test file contained markdown code fences, causing syntax errors during test collection.
Source files contained markdown code fences which caused import/syntax errors when running tests.
requirements.txt contained code fences and invalid package pins (pytest==0.0.1, requests==0.0.1) causing pip install failures.

Packaging step wrote artifacts to the wrong dist directory when invoked from the cd/ folder, preventing the deployment copy step from finding artifacts. Adjusted setup.py to emit sdist artifacts into the repository root dist/ directory.
Missing README caused a packaging warning during sdist. Added a README.md to address the warning.
Repository missing .gitignore entries for the virtual environment. Added .venv/ to .gitignore to avoid committing local environments.
